features: [ Over 30000+ Built-in Retro Games Stick ] - Enjoy a vast collection of games with no need to download or install anything, as long as connected to the TV or monitor can play directly , With 9 big simulators,you'll never run out of options

[ Two competitive gamepads ] - Play with friends and family with Premium Competitive level Dual Controllers adapters that are responsive and easy to operate, providing a more enjoyable and fun gaming experience, best competitive gamepads, best new experience

[ Easy Plug and Play Game console ] - Simply connect the controller to the power supply, plug it into the TV, and turn the power on the TV to the HD channel, The game list screen will display on the TV, and you're ready to play. [2 controllers require 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package]

[ Immersive 4K Gaming Experience ] - Enjoy high-definition picture quality with 4K HDMI output and 2K 1080P resolution, equipped with extended HDMI cable, suitable for different monitors [Only need to have HDMI interface], can be connected to TV/computer/TV set-top box /PC, perfect to meet your high resolution and game configuration needs, and the retro stick supports saving game progress, making it perfect for saving game progress at anytime.

[ Perfect Holiday Gift ] - Ideal for birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and parties, this classic version of the console is perfect for children and adults alike. With a vast collection of games, it's sure to bring joy and enhance communication and feelings with loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Most are just arcade games from 1981 to 1998.Over 10,000 games but probably 60% actually work. Got this thinking it would have super Mario or Pokémon and it didn't. I Will be returning this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Se ben muy bien los controles y se manejan bien.. lo malo esque el juego esta como modo lento aprietas los botones y alos 2 segundos reacciona el juego.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gifts for gamers of all ages!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the retro game console as a gift for my son and he loves it. Not only is it a great console for kids, adults can enjoy it too. a lot of games to choose from, there is something for everyone. The wireless controller is easy to operate and the 4K HDMI output provides stunning visuals. It's the perfect gift for birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas or any other occasion. It has brought our family closer together and provided hours of entertainment.
E un lego quindi una garanzia bello mio figlio si è divertito e molto carino montato

reviews.reviewTitle: Un lego que mon fils adore et moi aussi!
reviews.reviewText: Un lego quoi donc rien à dire! On adore!

reviews.reviewTitle: No estoy conforme por el precio
reviews.reviewText: No me ha gustado pagar 75 euros y tenerlo en la cesta por 66

reviews.reviewTitle: Lego ist und bleibt einfach nur top!
reviews.reviewText: riesiger Spielspaß, der Lütte ist rundum begeistert

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is the 4th hidden side set we’ve bought our son now and they’re great. He has his own iPad and you download the app and the Lego model comes to life. You can also play games on the app using the model as a type of AR background. Very clever stuff. Also the usual high quality build of Lego goes without saying. Always pleased.
